Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka have a 1-0 lead in the series
India's batting unit has performed way below par in the series
Sri Lanka's spin bowling attack has been too hot to handle for India
Others: A win in the third match will give Sri Lanka their first bilateral ODI series triumph over India in 27 years
The pitches at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo for the first two ODIs have provided a lot of assistance to the spin bowlers
The average first inning score of 226 in ODI cricket at this venue could end up being very difficult to chase down for either Sri Lanka or India in the series decider
